data.name: Chased by Darkness
data.detailed_description:
Join the Official Discord


About the Game

Your job is to face supernatural entities that are not from our world. Survive against enemies from the spirit underworld and perform banishments to send them back where they belong.





  • Single player mode
Do all the work alone. But be careful, any mistake will cost a lot.

  • 2-4 player co-op
Join with other players and work together to fight the darkness.

  • Banish powerful spirits
Face enemies and banish the spirits back to where they belong.

  • Escalating difficulty
Enemies will get faster and more aggressive as the game progresses.





  • Level system
Progress through the level system and unlock characters and new guns.

  • Gameplay diversity
Each map has its own characteristics and mechanics.

  • Insane mode
If you are looking for a challenge, the Insane mode was made for you. Faster, harder, crazier!

  • Free major updates
Chased by Darkness is regularly updated with free content. New maps, variety of enemies and new ways to play.

WARNING

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: Chased by Darkness is a 1-4 players co-op survival horror. Your mission is to face supernatural entities and banish them to the spiritual plane. Explore, fight enemies and don't let the darkness reach you.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Polish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 RS5 (Build 1809)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: The following setting is recommended for Medium quality at an average rate of 60 FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 RS5 (Build 1809)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: The following setting is recommended for Ultra quality at an average rate of 60 FPS. For Ray Tracing and DLSS a compatible video card is required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
